bwwExcerpt: : "MJ" is a jukebox musical that is nothing but the late King of Pop's greatest hits. Would Jackson himself approve of such a sentimental journey? More to the point is that his estate has approved it. And that is only one of the minor offenses on display in "MJ," which opened Tuesday at Broadway's Neil Simon Theatre.

nothing but the late King of Pop's greatest hits
